{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Reference Design Evaluation Board |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.olimex.com/Products/SOM/AM335X/AM3352-SOM-EVB/open-source-hardware |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Olimex |model = AM3352 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -SOM-EVB |revision = Rev D |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;AM3352; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 600 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G16460-BCK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = SMSC;8710A; |eth3chip = SMSC;8710A; |sw_cpu = true |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 1C:BA:8C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2016.09;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.59;Debian 8;,
|exp_if_types = Micro SD Card slot, USB 2.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 6-16 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VGA out, CAN Bus, UEXT, GPIO, |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 3.3V CAN Bus Transceiver;TI;SN65HVD230;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;2;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482;;1;,,, Octal Buffer Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74ALVC244;;6;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2015 |estprice = 82 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07M9CY1VR |asin_country = FR |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Bulgaria
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Texas Instruments]]'' AM3352 @1GHz Cortex-A8 :2 Programmable Real-Time Units @200Mhz *GPU: ''PowerVR SGX530'' *Memory: 512MB DDR3 SDRAM *Onboard Storage: TF card (max. 128GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 2x GbE LAN, 4x USB 2.0 ports. 1x CAN
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/OLIMEX/SOM/tree/master/AM3352/AM3352-SOM-EVB Open Source/Open Hardware Schematics] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/02/19/olimex-announces-availability-of-ti-am3352-and-rockchip-rk3188-som-and-evaluation-boards/ ''Olimex Announces Availability of TI AM3352'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/olimex-dives-into-linuxandroid-modules/ ''Olimex dives into Linux/Android modules'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==See also== [http://linux-sunxi.org/Category:Community_Devices Community Devices] *[[Olimex OLinuXino-MAXI]] *[[Olimex A10-OLinuXino-Lime]] *[[Olimex A10s-OLinuXino-Micro]] *[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino]] *[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino WIFI]] *[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino-Micro]] *[[Olimex A13-SOM]] *[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime]] *[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime2]] *[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Micro]] *[[Olimex A20-SOM]]
